metadata.title: CVE-2021-3541 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in libxml2. Exponential entity expansion attack its possible bypassing all existing protection mechanisms and leading to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-6.7
libxml2-utils - 2.9.10+dfsg-6.7
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-6.7
No subscription required

notes.note: avital> Not reproducible in 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1 and prior

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-6.7').
